content: growing leaves cowl by meghan macko i originally released this pattern in 2009 and i am thrilled so many people have enjoyed knitting the growing leaves cowl the growing leaves pattern is fun to knit as there s something to do on every row a rarity when knitting lace the growing leaves cowl is meant to fit close so you can tuck it into your jacket collar on chilly days the cowl knits up quickly with one skein and makes a wonderful gift details notions us size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle stitch marker yarn malabrigo rios worsted 100% merino superwash 210 yards/100 grams 1 skeins lettuce colorway yardage approximately 200 yards gauge one repeat of growing leaves pattern is 2 8 wide and 2 25 high after blocking final measurements 9 high 20 circumference measurements taken after light blocking abbreviations k knit rs right side p purl p2tog tbl purl 2 together through back loop this yo yarn over stitch is only used in the flat version of the growing k2tog knit two together leaves stitch pattern when working in the round it ssk slip slip knit slip_stitch knitwise slip next will be worked from the front and replaced by an stitch purlwise slip lefthand needle into both ssk stitch is worked as follows insert needle from stitches from left to right through front loops and left to right into the next two stitches on the back knit together side of your work and purl together if you are not repeat repeat familiar with this stitch you should watch a youtube st s stitch es tutorial it s pretty awkward co cast on bobble bind-off pattern stitches to knit a gauge swatch you will need to use the flat version of the pattern i would recommend beginning and ending with a few row of garter stitch as well as 3 knit stitches and the beginning and end of each row to create a garter stitch border growing leaves stitch pattern -
